name: Defensive Qualities 2
description: Advanced defensive qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: BRACE
qualities.description:
Requirement: **STAGE 2**
When the Digimon takes **Damage** from an **Attack**, it can use an **Interrupt Action** to make a **CPU (Endurance) Check**. The **TN** equals 10 + the **Damage** taken after being reduced by **Armor**.

**Success**: The **Damage** is further reduced by half (after **Armor**).
**Critical Success**: In addition, if this would reduce the **Damage** taken to 1, it instead takes 0 **Damage**.

This does not affect **Unalterable Damage**. Each time the Quality is used, the **TN** increases by 3 for any further use until the end of Combat.

qualities.name: SAVAGERY
qualities.description:
Requirement: **STAGE 2, COMBAT MONSTER**
**Once per round** when the Digimon would declare an **Attack**, they can choose to declare **SAVAGERY**. The Digimon makes a **CPU (Endurance) Check**. The **TN** equals 15 - the Digimon's **DOS**.

**Failure**: The Digimon takes **Unalterable Damage** equal to its **Stage**, which counts towards **Resolve**.
**Success**: The Digimon still takes the **Damage** but also gains **Temporary Wound Boxes** equal to the amount of **Damage** taken, which last until the end of Combat.
**Critical Success**: The Digimon gains twice as many **Temporary Wound Boxes**.

The **Unalterable Damage** from this Quality bypasses **Temporary Wound Boxes**.

qualities.name: ASSURED DESTRUCTION
qualities.description:
Requirement: **STAGE 2, COMBAT MONSTER**
When the Digimon makes an **Attack** against an Enemy, it can choose to convert any amount of **Resolve** into additional dice in its **Accuracy Pool** instead of converting it into additional **Damage**. This bonus is only applied to that one **Attack**.
